ComicInfo.Title: Manplant from the Tomb; Midnight Muse; Phantom of the Rock Era; Slime World
ComicInfo.Summary:
1. Manplant from the Tomb (written by Otto Binder)
2. Midnight Muse (written by Michael Cahlin)
3. Phantom of the Rock Era (written by Chuck McNaughton : reprinted from: Nightmare (Skywald, 1970) #4)
4. Slime World (written by Chuck McNaughton : reprinted from: Nightmare (Skywald, 1970) #5)
